body:
Punching should be a game option!!

Many times on CTH we all agree to just punch (no swords) and for an extra challenge PVP in F5!
Too fun!!!! :)

Maybe there could be a vote at the start of CTH like 'kit' or 'no kit'.
'No kit' would be punching only and would effect everyone in the match.  Loadout would be golden apples only... no weapons.

video - https://youtu.be/MMDnwUbVNRI
twenty one pilots - Guns For Hands
music - https://youtu.be/Pmv8aQKO6k0?list=RDPmv8aQKO6k0

title: [CTH] Punching F5 Battle - Idea?

replies.body:
How would you know if players are using F5?

Also this idea kills the "Kit option" for CTH since CTH is all about using specific kits to help you in matches so you can gather points for your team.
replies.body_tagged:
How would you know if players are using F5?

Also this idea kills the "Kit option" for CTH since CTH is all about using specific kits to help you in matches so you can gather points for your team.

replies.body:
I was just doing the F5 view for fun.  I was only suggesting the 'no kit' option.

Good point, but if you noticed I was still getting points and trying to get to middle when I heard the bell.

Maybe it's a new gamemode then... CTH with no kits?  Or during rotations...one map has no kits or weapons.
replies.body_tagged:
I was just doing the F5 view for fun.  I was only suggesting the 'no kit' option.

Good point, but if you noticed I was still getting points and trying to get to middle when I heard the bell.

Maybe it's a new gamemode then... CTH with no kits?  Or during rotations...one map has no kits or weapons.

replies.body: Nice video Murph I can see myself in the background getting rekted by Splades. As for the idea I don't really think its needed... I mean having punch fights like that is fun but I wouldn't enjoy having a map/game just for it.
replies.body_tagged: Nice video Murph I can see myself in the background getting rekted by Splades. As for the idea I don't really think its needed... I mean having punch fights like that is fun but I wouldn't enjoy having a map/game just for it.
